question: Hi everyone, I am sitting at my desk crying because in Nov. 2009 I had a m/c and I always wonder what could have happened.Well I am now a little over 5 weeks and now I wonder if the m/c in Nov. 09 was because my DH has Type 2 Diabetes.  Does anyones hubby, fiance, or boyfriend have Type 2 Diabetes?
title: DH Has Type 2 Diabetes-Scared-Please help
